item.title: Optimize your Hugo Blog With Unlighthouse
item.description: Recently Google let me see the new Analytics dashboard (they moved from… Something something analytics to something something Analytics 4). And one of they things I saw was that my blog’s performance was bad! In general the blog’s infrastructure didn’t get much love since I opened it a few years ago, so a cleanup for performance and content is probably in order. Get initial Lighthouse results What’s Lighthouse? It’s a tool that Google provides to measure the performance of your site.
